Kansas_City.Science City at Union Station:
Science City at Union Station is a family-friendly interactive science center that features acclaimed traveling exhibitions, The Arvin Gottlieb Planetarium, City Extreme Screen theatre, and more than 120 hands-on displays.
It is located inside Union Station at 30 West Pershing Road in Kansas City, Missouri.


== Background ==
Science City was part of a renovation plan for Union Station after being closed for a short period of time when Trizec, a Canadian redevelopment firm had failed to redevelop the station.
